languages.text: Маражай жаждет встречи с кабалитами Опустошительной бури, которые, вероятно, будут изгнаны из Комморры. Бывший дракон настаивает на том, чтобы лично иметь дело с теми, кем раньше повелевал.
Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.
languages.original_text: Маражай жаждет встречи с кабалитами Опустошительной бури, которые, вероятно, будут изгнаны из Комморры. Бывший дракон настаивает на том, чтобы лично иметь дело с теми, кем раньше повелевал.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.
Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.
Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.
Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.

languages.text: Marazhai souhaite rencontrer un groupe de Kabalites de la Tempête ravageuse qui sont certainement sur le point d'être bannis de Commorragh. L'ancien dracon insiste pour s'occuper personnellement de ceux qu'il commandait autrefois.
languages.original_text: Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai souhaite rencontrer un groupe de Kabalites de la Tempête ravageuse qui sont certainement sur le point d'être bannis de Commorragh. L'ancien dracon insiste pour s'occuper personnellement de ceux qu'il commandait autrefois.

languages.text: 玛拉斋希望能和狂风阴谋团的成员见个面。那些人此刻被驱逐出了科摩罗，而这位前任裁决官打算亲自和他曾经的手下打个交道。
languages.original_text: Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋希望能和狂风阴谋团的成员见个面。那些人此刻被驱逐出了科摩罗，而这位前任裁决官打算亲自和他曾经的手下打个交道。

languages.text: マラズハイは、コモラフから追放されそうになっている略奪の嵐陰謀団の一行と面会することを希望している。かつてのドラコンは、自分が率いていた者たちと個人的に取引することに固執している。
languages.original_text: Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイは、コモラフから追放されそうになっている略奪の嵐陰謀団の一行と面会することを希望している。かつてのドラコンは、自分が率いていた者たちと個人的に取引することに固執している。

languages.text: Marazhai möchte sich mit einer Gruppe von Mitgliedern des plündernden Sturms treffen, die vermutlich aus Commorragh verbannt werden. Der ehemalige Dracon besteht darauf, persönlich mit seinen ehemaligen Untergebenen zu sprechen.
languages.original_text: Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai möchte sich mit einer Gruppe von Mitgliedern des plündernden Sturms treffen, die vermutlich aus Commorragh verbannt werden. Der ehemalige Dracon besteht darauf, persönlich mit seinen ehemaligen Untergebenen zu sprechen.

languages.text: Marazhai quiere reunirse con un grupo de Kabalistas de la Tempestad Asoladora que probablemente hayan sido desterrados de Commorragh. El Dracón quiere ocuparse personalmente de sus antiguos subordinados.
languages.original_text: Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai quiere reunirse con un grupo de Kabalistas de la Tempestad Asoladora que probablemente hayan sido desterrados de Commorragh. El Dracón quiere ocuparse personalmente de sus antiguos subordinados.

languages.text: Marazhai, muhtemelen Commorragh'tan sürgün edilmiş olan bir grup Müfteris Kasırga Kabalisti ile görüşmek istiyor. Eski Drakon, eskiden emrinde olanlarla kişisel olarak ilgilenme konusunda ısrar ediyor.
languages.original_text: Marazhai desires to meet with a group of Kabalites of the Reaving Tempest who are likely to be banished from Commorragh. The former Dracon insists on personally dealing with those he used to command.
